# DCDM Group 8 Project

This repositroy contains scripts and documentation for data, cleaning, database design, and visualisation of IMPC data for the 7BBG1003 coursework.

## Folder structure
- 'scripts/' - R scripts for data cleaning and processing
- 'data/' - raw and cleaned data files (not tracked if too large)
- 'outputs/' - plots and porcessed outputs
- 'docs/' - Quarto documents and reports
